full_text: ae iar 2014/KER/220 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935 Cr1.MC.No. 38 of 2014 () (CRIME NO.507/2013 OF NALLALAM POLICE STATION, KOZHIKODE) PETITIONERS /ACCUSED: 1. MUHAMMED FAISAL, AGED 37 YEARS S/O. ABDUL GAFOOR, KUWAIT HOUSE, P.O.OLAVANNA OLAVANNA AMSOM DESOM, KOHIKODE DISTRICT. 2. K.P.RAZAK, AGED 32 YEARS $/O.ABDUL GAFOOR, KUWAIT HOUSE, P.O.OLAVANNA OLAVANNA AMSOM DESOM, KOHIKODE DISTRICT 3. RASHEED P. $/O.ABOOBACKER, POOLAKKAL HOUSE, P.O.OLAVANNA OLAVANNA AMSOM DESOM, KOHIKODE DISTRICT BY ADV. SRI.C.M.MOHAMMED IQUABAL RESPONDENT /STATE: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM-682 031. R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. S. HYMA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: SCL. 2014/KER/220 HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. Cri.M.C No.38 of 2014 Dated this the 2 day of January, 2014 ORDER Petitioners are arrayed as the accused in Crime No.507 of 2013 of Nallalam Police Station, Kozhikode District. The offences alleged are punishable under Sections 341, 323, 326 and 294(b) r/w Section 34 of I.P.C. 2. Petitioners are willing to surrender before the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-V, Kozhikode. Non-bailable warrant is pending against them. Now, the petitioners seek a direction from this Court to consider their application for bail on the date of surrender itself. In the facts and circumstances, the Crl.M.C. is disposed of, directing the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-V, Kozhikode to consider and pass orders on the bail application on the date of surrender itself in the event of the petitioners surrendering before the court below and submitting an application for bail with prior notice to the Assistant Public Prosecutor within a period of 15 days from today. The non-bailable warrant issued against the petitioner shall be kept in abeyance till the disposal of the bail application. Sd/- HARUN-UL-RASHID, Judge. Scl.
